revised_title: The Discovery and Preparation of Seignette's Sal Polychrestus Rupellensis
tldr: M. Geoffroy shares his discovery of the composition of Seignette's Sal Polychrestus Rupellensis, a tartarum solubile composed of cream or crystals of tartar and the purified salt of Kali of Alicante. He also describes the properties and methods of preparation for this unique salt and other related chemical compounds.
